column5: Will be visiting my folks for Christmas and need to stock up. They gotta be cheaper there than up here.
You can get them at Bass Pro...not too far from Mississauga.  Cheers  Craig
Thanks I'll be stopping in there anyway.
angling specialties had a variation of them last time i was there a couple years ago,
PM Meegs and see what he can do for you. I know James is pouring a bunch for sale for this season. ....
Also hit up Angling Specialties at Conderation and Central Pkwy.  If you DO end up going there, call me!  I GOTTA meet the legendary Drifter!!!
Nope.  I'ze serious!!  Don't let me down, man!!!  It will be my new avatar...a pic of me and the Arctic Angler  :D
